title: Provides that the periods of the Iranian Hostage Crisis and from November 21, 1979 to October 20, 1981 be "time of war" periods for civil service credit
summary: Provides that the periods of the Iranian Hostage Crisis and from November 21, 1979 to October 20, 1981 be "time of war" periods for civil service credit.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to making the Iranian Hostage Crisis "time of war" for civil service credit
